original: 荊州人。劉備領荊州牧時，孫權遣使商議與劉備共同攻蜀，殷觀獻計讚同孫權伐蜀，但暫不出兵，如此一來，孫吳必不敢橫跨荊州獨自攻蜀。
text: Jingzhou people. When Liu Bei led Jingzhou to herd, Sun Quan sent an envoy to discuss with Liu Bei to attack Shu together. Yin Guan offered his plan to agree with Sun Quan's attack on Shu, but he did not send troops for the time being. As a result, Sun Wu would not dare to cross Jingzhou to attack Shu alone.
